sentence.Network_en: The changes of granulation deserve particular attention.

sentence.Network_en: The filigree, presumably by virtue of these fields, completely alters the structure of the granulation.
sentence.Network_cn: 大概是由于这些磁场的作用, 精细网络完全改变了米粒组织的结构.

sentence.Network_en: " Yes ! Gas washing requires considerable water. Besides, slag granulation and other purpose also need water. "
sentence.Network_cn: 有 啊! 清洗炉气需要相当数量的水, 此外, 炉渣水碎及其他用途也需要水.
